name: AHU 350 CFM Pro
description: Professional air handler with HEPA + Activated Carbon filtration. Safe for hazardous materials.

flowCharacteristics.note: When connected in-line with AC, adds to total system airflow

filterType.name: HEPA + Activated Carbon
filterType.description: Hospital-grade HEPA filter combined with activated carbon for gas adsorption. Effective against toxic vapors.
capabilities: Activated carbon adsorbs volatile organic compounds (VOCs)
Effective against ammonia, acetone, ethanol vapors
Suitable for laboratory and hazardous material handling

filtrationEfficiency.note: HEPA captures particulates, activated carbon adsorbs gases. CO2 requires scrubber (not just filter).
